tips.tip1: Birds form strong bonds with their caregivers. Spend quality time with your feathered friend daily to strengthen your relationship.
tips.tip2: Capture your bird's personality! Photos and videos help others connect with your bird's story.
tips.tip3: Keep your bird safe by bird-proofing your home. Remove toxic plants and cover mirrors to prevent accidents.
tips.tip4: A balanced diet is key to bird health. Include fresh fruits, vegetables, and species-appropriate seeds.
tips.tip5: Your support makes a difference! Even small contributions help bird owners provide better care.

privacy.intro: Wihngo respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.whoWeAreContent: Wihngo is a love-centric community platform for people who care about birds. The platform is operated in the European Union and is in the process of registration in Estonia.
privacy.whatDataWeCollectIntro: When you use the Wihngo app, we may collect:
privacy.dataBirdInfo: Bird information you share (species, name, photos, stories)
privacy.dataTechnicalInfo: Technical data (device type, OS version, IP address)
privacy.reasonProvideService: Provide and maintain the Wihngo service
privacy.reasonConnectUsers: Connect people who care about birds
privacy.reasonImproveApp: Improve app performance and user experience
privacy.legalBasisContent: Data is processed under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) based on legitimate interest and contractual necessity.
privacy.dataSharingContent: We do not sell your data. Some data may be processed by trusted service providers (such as payment processors, cloud hosting, and analytics services). All providers are required to protect your data.
privacy.dataRetentionContent: Data is kept only as long as necessary for the purposes described above, or as required by law.
privacy.yourRightsContent: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your personal data. You can also object to processing or request restriction.
privacy.contactIntro: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact:
privacy.footer: Wihngo is committed to transparency and protecting your personal information in accordance with EU data protection laws.

terms.intro: By using Wihngo mobile apps or website, you agree to these Terms.
terms.platformRoleContent: Wihngo is a community platform for bird lovers. It is not a charity, bank, or financial institution. Wihngo provides a space for users to share stories and support birds voluntarily.
terms.appUsageContent: The Wihngo app is provided for connecting people who care about birds, sharing bird stories, and offering support. You must use the app responsibly and in accordance with these terms.
terms.supportFundsIntro: When a user chooses to support a bird, the funds are temporarily held by Wihngo.
terms.supportFundsCollected: Funds are collected by Wihngo and distributed to users once per month.
terms.supportFundsMinimum: Minimum payout threshold: ‚Ç¨10. If a user's balance is below ‚Ç¨10, it rolls over to the next payout.
terms.supportFundsMethod: Payouts are made via bank transfer or another method selected by Wihngo.
terms.supportFundsFee: Wihngo takes a platform fee (e.g., 5%) automatically from each support payment.
terms.supportFundsDelays: Wihngo is not responsible for delays caused by banking, payment networks, or crypto networks.
terms.cryptoSupportPayout: Users may choose to receive payouts in crypto.
terms.cryptoSupportPeerToPeer: Crypto payouts are peer-to-peer and subject to network fees and volatility.
terms.cryptoSupportNoGuarantee: Wihngo does not guarantee value at payout time.
terms.cryptoSupportIrreversible: Crypto transactions are irreversible. Users must double-check addresses and networks.
terms.cryptoSupportNotWallet: Wihngo is not a wallet. Wihngo does not guarantee delivery. Crypto support is peer-to-peer.
terms.userContentContent: Users retain ownership of their content (stories, images). By posting, users grant Wihngo a non-exclusive license to display content publicly.
terms.guidelineRespectful: Be respectful and kind to others
terms.guidelineNoHarm: Not post harmful, offensive, or misleading content
terms.noGuaranteesContent: Wihngo does not guarantee outcomes for bird support, stories, or interactions. Support is voluntary and at the user's discretion.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityContent: Wihngo is not responsible for any loss or damage arising from the use of the app. This includes, but is not limited to, financial losses, data loss, or any indirect damages.
terms.accountTerminationContent: Wihngo reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in harmful behavior.
terms.governingLawContent: These Terms are governed by the laws of Estonia and the European Union.
terms.changesContent: Wihngo may update these terms from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes through the app.
terms.footer: Thank you for being part of the Wihngo community and caring about birds.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Wihngo

payouts.title: Payouts & Funds
payouts.whenDoIGetPaidAnswer: Payouts happen once per month, typically on the 1st-5th of each month. You will receive a payout when your balance reaches the minimum threshold of ‚Ç¨10.
payouts.whyMinimumAnswer: The minimum payout threshold helps reduce transaction fees and processing costs. This ensures that both you and Wihngo can operate efficiently. If you don't reach ‚Ç¨10 in a month, your balance will roll over to the next month.
payouts.whatIfNeverReach: What happens if I never reach ‚Ç¨10?
payouts.whatIfNeverReachAnswer: Your balance accumulates each month until you reach the ‚Ç¨10 threshold. Once you reach it, you'll receive a payout on the next scheduled payout date. Your funds never expire.
payouts.platformFeeAnswer: Wihngo charges a 5% platform fee on all support received. This fee helps us maintain the platform, process payments, and continue improving Wihngo. 95% of every support payment goes directly to you.
payouts.payoutMethodsAnswer: You can receive payouts via bank transfer (SEPA/IBAN), PayPal, or cryptocurrency (USDC/EURC on Solana). Choose the method that works best for you in your payout settings.

support.title: Supporting Birds
support.howToSupport: How do I support a bird?
support.howToSupportAnswer: Tap the 'Support' button on any bird's profile, select an amount, choose your payment method (PayPal or crypto), and complete the payment. Support is voluntary and goes directly to helping care for the bird.
support.whatIsSupportAnswer: Support helps bird owners with food, veterinary care, housing, and other expenses. It's a way for the community to come together and help birds in need.
support.canICancel: Can I cancel or refund my support?
support.canICancelAnswer: All support is voluntary and final. Wihngo does not process refunds. Please make sure you want to support a bird before completing your payment.

crypto.title: Crypto Payments
crypto.whichCryptoAnswer: Wihngo supports USDC and EURC on the Solana network. These are stablecoins, meaning their value is pegged to the US Dollar and Euro respectively.
crypto.whySolanaAnswer: Solana offers extremely low transaction fees (typically less than $0.01) and fast confirmation times, making it ideal for small-to-medium support payments.
crypto.isCryptoSafeAnswer: Crypto transactions are irreversible and require careful attention. Always double-check the wallet address and network before sending. Wihngo does not custody your crypto and cannot reverse transactions.
crypto.wrongNetwork: What if I send on the wrong network?
crypto.wrongNetworkAnswer: Sending crypto to the wrong network will result in permanent loss of funds. Always confirm you are sending on the correct network (Solana). Wihngo cannot recover funds sent to the wrong network.
crypto.cryptoPayoutVolatilityAnswer: If you choose to receive payouts in crypto, you accept the risk of market volatility. The value of your payout may change between when it's calculated and when you receive it. Wihngo does not guarantee any specific value.

account.title: Account & Privacy
account.howToDeleteAccount: How do I delete my account?
account.howToDeleteAccountAnswer: Go to Settings > Privacy Settings > Delete Account. Please note that deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone.
account.isDataSafeAnswer: Yes. Wihngo follows GDPR regulations and uses encryption to protect your data. We never sell your personal information.
account.canIChangeEmail: Can I change my email address?
account.canIChangeEmailAnswer: Currently, email changes must be requested through support@wihngo.com. We're working on adding this feature directly to the app.

legal.title: Legal & Compliance
legal.isWihngoRegulated: Is Wihngo a regulated financial institution?
legal.isWihngoRegulatedAnswer: No. Wihngo is a community platform, not a bank or financial institution. We facilitate voluntary support between users. Wihngo temporarily holds funds for monthly payouts but does not offer financial services.
legal.taxResponsibilityAnswer: Bird owners are responsible for reporting and paying any applicable taxes on support received through Wihngo. We recommend consulting with a tax professional in your jurisdiction.
legal.whereIsWihngoRegisteredAnswer: Wihngo is in the process of registration in Estonia and operates within the European Union.

checkout.paymentFailed: Your payment could not be processed. Please try again or contact support if you believe this is an error.

hereForBirds.title: We're here because we love birds.
hereForBirds.content: Wihngo exists so people who care for birds can share that care with others. Every feature we build asks: does this help birds and the people who love them?

honest.title: We're honest about how this works.
honest.content: Wihngo is not a charity. We're a small team running a real platform with real costs ‚Äî servers, storage, development, security. We charge a small fee (5%) to cover these. Without it, Wihngo wouldn't exist.

sustainability.title: Sustainability enables care.
sustainability.content: A platform that can't survive can't help anyone. We keep costs low, stay small, and make decisions that let us keep running for years ‚Äî not just months.

supportGoesWhere.title: Your support goes where it should.
supportGoesWhere.content: When you support a bird, the money goes to the owner to buy food, supplies, or whatever that bird needs. The fee covers the platform. That's it.

transparency.title: We choose transparency over polish.
transparency.content: We'd rather explain honestly than sound perfect. If something changes, we'll tell you. If we make a mistake, we'll own it.

fees.title: How Fees Work
fees.intro: We believe in being upfront about costs. Here's exactly where your money goes.

why.title: Why we charge a fee
why.content: Running a platform costs money. Storage, servers, security, development ‚Äî these are real expenses that grow as more people join. The 5% fee keeps Wihngo sustainable so we can continue helping birds and their owners for years to come.

optional.title: You can choose to cover the fee
optional.content: When you support a bird, you'll see an option to add a small amount to cover the platform fee. This is optional ‚Äî your support reaches the bird either way.

mediaLimits.photoTooLarge: This photo is a bit large. Try a smaller file (under 10MB) or take a new one directly in the app.
mediaLimits.videoTooLong: Videos can be up to 60 seconds ‚Äî just enough to capture a special moment.
